mapper.update: update worker set is_used = '1' where worker_phone=#{workerPhone} and worker_name=#{workerName}
update worker set is_used = '0' where worker_phone=#{phone} and worker_name=#{name}
mapper.select: select * from worker where worker_phone=#{workerPhone} and worker_name=#{workerName}
SELECT wxuser.wxUser_openid,worker.worker_id FROM worker JOIN wxuser ON worker.worker_phone = wxuser.phone WHERE worker.is_used = '1' ORDER BY worker.normal_last_assigned LIMIT 1
SELECT wxuser.wxUser_openid,worker.worker_id FROM worker JOIN wxuser ON worker.worker_phone = wxuser.phone WHERE worker.is_used = '1' ORDER BY worker.emergency_last_assigned LIMIT 1
